Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.fsys

This package contains a set of FileSystemInterface implementations and a factory to get access to them. Since 0.0.2 it also contains an implementation of URLStreamHandler (named FileSystemURLStreamHandler) to support access to the file systems thru the URL mechanism

Every FileSystemInterface implementation is deployed into the Java runtime by the Java SPI protocol (the same one is used by all JDBC drivers). Concept of the 'File System' see FileSystemInterface description.

Pure library contains File system interfaces:

  • FileSystemOnFile - the usual file system
  • FileSystemOnFileSystem - file system based on Java 1.7 and later standard file systems mechanism
  • chav1961.purelib.fsys.FileSystemOnCsvDb - file system provided access to database content in the CSV format via JDBC protocol
  • FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly - read-only file system based on XML
  • FileSystemInMemory - file system in the RAM

Extension of the pure library will contain much more implementations of the File systems (SVN, Git, Amazon S3 etc).

Since:
0.0.1, last change at 0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
FileSystemInterface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFileSystem
    This abstract class implements the most of all FileSystemInterface functionality.
    FileSystemClassLoader  
    FileSystemFactory
    This class is a factory for creating file system instances for the given URI type.
    FileSystemInMemory
    This class implements the file system interface in the RAM.
    FileSystemOnClassLoader  
    FileSystemOnFile
    This class implements the file system interface on the usual file system.
    FileSystemOnFileSystem
    This class implements the file system interface on the standard file system mechanism in the Java 1.7 and later.
    FileSystemOnRMI
    This class implements the file system interface on remote server using standard Java RMI protocol.
    FileSystemOnXMLReadOnly
    This class implements the file system interface on the XML file content.
    FileSystemURLStreamHandler
    This class implements standard URLStreamHandler functionality to get access to the file systems thru it's URLs.
    PureLibFileSystemProvider  
    RMIFileSystemServer
    This class is a server to the FileSystemOnRMI class.
